title: The World of Peter Rabbit and friends
creator_credit: John Coates, Frederick Warne and Company and TVC London
brief_description: The delightful drawings and stories of Beatrix Potter are stunningly recreated in this excellent series. From the mischievious Peter Rabbit and his near fatal encounter with Mr. McGregor, to Jemima Puddle-duck and her naive trust in the Fox, these stories will entertain and stimulate young minds.
